multipleNumbers.title: Multiple Numbers
multipleNumbers.subTitle: This contact has multiple number, please select one

listFull.title: The list is Full
listFull.subTitle: You can't add more than five contacts

invalidNumber.title: Invalid number
invalidNumber.subTitle: The contact you selected has not valid number

noContactsFound.title: No Contacts Found
noContactsFound.subTitle: Go to Home > Contacts > Add Contact

messageApplication.title: Message application not found
messageApplication.subTitle: The message application is not installed

welcomeSlide.title: Welcome in Sos App tutorial
welcomeSlide.subTitle: Sos app is a simple application that helps in emergency situations

contactsSlide.title: Add emergency contacts
contactsSlide.subTitle: Add the contacts you want to notify that you are in danger. You can't add duplicated contacts or contacts with invalid numbers

sosSlide.title: Sos Request
sosSlide.subTitle: You can tap sos button from home screen to send the sos request

mapSlide.title: Map View
mapSlide.subTitle: You can also view your position on the map. You can send sos request directly from the map screen

labelMarker.title: Actual Position
labelMarker.subTitle: Tap Sos button if you need help

sosMessage.messageStart: I am in danger, call for help. I am situated at following coordinates:
sosMessage.messageEnd: Message automatically sended by Sos App at the following date:
sosMessage.googleMapUrl: Tap at the following url for visualize my current position on google map:
